creator: Jonny Pinhorn
license_desciption: This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.
description: Karla is a grotesque sans serif typeface family that supports languages that use the Latin script and the Tamil script. This is the Latin script part of the family, with Roman and Italic styles in two weights, Regular and Bold. The Tamil parts are available from the Early Access page. To contribute to the project contact Jonathan Pinhorn.
